Summary._: Service changes and delays on the [1] because of track maintenance at South Ferry.

Description._: Service changes and delays on the [1] because of track maintenance at South Ferry.

LongDescription:
We're replacing rails at South Ferry this weekend. The last southbound [1] train will depart Chambers St tonight at 9:40 pm. The last northbound [1] train to leave South Ferry will depart tonight at 9:54 pm.

Free shuttle bus service is available between Chambers St and South Ferry.

Travel Alternatives
Days and Evenings:
For Lexington Av/63 St, Roosevelt Island and 21 St-Queensbridge take the [R]* instead via transfer at 34 St-Herald Sq or 74 St-Roosevelt Av.

Late Nights:
To Lexington Av/63 St, take the [Q] instead. Transfer between trains at 34 St-Herald Sq.

To Roosevelt Island and 21 St-Queensbridge, take the [F] to Roosevelt Av and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F].

From these stations, take a Coney Island-bound [F] to 47-50 Sts and transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F].

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.

Alternate travel note:
For 21 St-Queensbridge, consider nearby Queens Plaza.

Note: 57 St is closed for renovation.
